name: canva_scrape_design
description: Scrape a Canva design type page (e.g. presentations, social media, videos). Returns available templates, features, and popular designs for that category.

steps.code: const titleEl = document.querySelector('h1, [class*="hero"] h1, [class*="heading"]'); const descEl = document.querySelector('[class*="hero"] p, [class*="subtitle"], [class*="description"]'); const templates = []; const templateEls = document.querySelectorAll('a[href*="/templates/"], [class*="template"] a, [class*="card"] a'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(templateEls.length, 12); i++) { const el = templateEls[i]; const nameEl = el.querySelector('[class*="title"], h3, h4, [aria-label]'); const imgEl = el.querySelector('img'); const proEl = el.querySelector('[class*="pro"], [class*="premium"]'); templates.push({ title: nameEl ? (nameEl.getAttribute('aria-label') || nameEl.textContent.trim()) : (el.getAttribute('aria-label') || ''), is_premium: !!proEl, image: imgEl ? imgEl.getAttribute('src') : '', url: el.href || '' }); } const featureEls = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="feature"] h3, [class*="benefit"] h3, [class*="feature-item"]'); const features = []; featureEls.forEach(function(el) { const t = el.textContent.trim(); if (t && t.length < 100) features.push(t); }); const subcategoryEls = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="category"] a, [class*="subcategory"] a, nav a[href*="/templates/"]'); const subcategories = []; subcategoryEls.forEach(function(el) { const t = el.textContent.trim(); if (t && t.length < 80 && !subcategories.includes(t)) subcategories.push(t); }); return { design_type: `{{design_type}}`, title: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : '', description: descEl ? descEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 500) : '', features: features.slice(0, 10), subcategories: subcategories.slice(0, 10), template_count: templates.length, templates: templates, url: window.location.href }
